Any car club spaces should have active charging facilities. MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY 19.61 Part 1 (g) recognises that in some instances, short-term parking for specific uses, such as specialist and supported housing, are essential for the function or operational requirements of the development. Where on-street drop-off or other essential parking is proposed, the need for specific parking spaces must be demonstrated. 19.62 A Parking Design and Management Plan that outlines how parking will be designed, managed, and enforced must be submitted with all applications that include car parking provision, in line with Transport for London Guidance.
